Detailed Description

This file declares the interface for configuring the device init. All Module, CLock and DLPP Init API interface .

Function Documentation

int32_t PRCM_ConfigAllDPLL ( uint32_t  level,
uint32_t  siliconPkgType 
)

Configures the Dpll as per Level and Package Type.

Parameters
levelThe OPP level desired by the application
siliconPkgTypeSilicon Package type present on EVM
Returns
status Returns the status of the API. This can be the following values: PM_SUCCESS If the desired power state was met. PM_FAIL If the desired power state was not met.

Parameters

Returns

int32_t PRCM_ConfigFirmware ( const void *  pImage,
uint32_t  imageSize 
)

Configure firmware on processors dedicated to power management.

Parameters
pImagePointer to firmware image to be loaded onto processor
imageSizeSize of image in bytes
Returns
status Returns the status of the API. This can be the following values: PM_SUCCESS If the firmware was loaded and configured successfully PM_FAIL If an error occurred during firmware load and configure
int32_t PRCM_getDpllStructure ( pmhalPrcmNodeId_t  dpllId,
pmhalPrcmSysClkVal_t  sysClk,
uint32_t  opp,
uint32_t  siliconPackageType,
pmhalPrcmDpllConfig_t **  dpllCfg 
)

returns the Dpll Structure with m,n hsdiv val .

Parameters
dpllIddpll Id who's config needs to be obtained
sysClkSys Clock frequency
oppThe OPP level which the pll would be configured
siliconPackageTypeSilicon Package type present on EVM
dpllCfgStructure updated with m,n,hsdiv value
Returns
status Returns the status of the API. This can be the following values: PM_SUCCESS If the desired power state was met. PM_FAIL If the desired power state was not met.
